title: Login Issue
description: Customer unable to log in with correct credentials.

title: Payment Failure
description: Transaction declined even though card is valid.

title: App Crash
description: Mobile app crashes when opening order history.

title: Refund Request
description: Customer requested refund for a duplicate order.

title: Delivery Delay
description: Order not delivered even after 5 days of shipping.

title: Coupon Code Not Working
description: Discount coupon entered but not applied at checkout.

title: Product Missing
description: Customer received incomplete order with missing items.

title: Slow Website
description: Customer reported that the website is loading very slowly.

title: Order Not Received
description: Customer claims the order status shows delivered but nothing received.

title: Password Reset Not Working
description: Reset password link expired immediately after receiving.

title: Damaged Product
description: Customer received a damaged product in the last order.
